Campus Ghosts

By Iza Bienkowska

York is considered the most haunted city in the world. It is said to have around 140 ghosts, each with their own history. You can see a small girl in a window of the house behind York Minster, or meet a monk in St. Maryâ€™s Abbey. Even pubs are haunted here, with the Golden Fleece taking the lead! Not convinced? Go for a night walk in the city and see for yourself! There are over 500 recorded hauntings in York, maybe you'll be lucky as well... Meanwhile, we present to you our very own ghosts on campus! Models: Isabella Edwards, Zoe Golds-Banyard, Adeline Coupe
